modName: Morrowindic Sneak Attack and Critical Hit Sound
summary: Sneak attack sound is changed to old Morrowind style sneak attacks. I know there are people missing old morrowind days. I also still play morrowind..
descriptionHtml:
Changed the annoying drum sound when the player performs a sneak attack or critical hit. For the ones those miss old Morang Tong days in Morrowind...


All thanks to MORROWIND producer team. I thank them for letting lots of people to know how the \"ATHMOPHERE\" in such a game must be.
author: Revoith
